item.title: "Ditto," the NewJeans gateway drug
item.description: I can finally wrap my head around the NewJeans thesis without the other clutter.

item.title: HSU
item.description: One year after the death of a bassist, a beginner learns to live with the memories he left behind.

item.title: The crimes that "stable, dutiful" Elizabeth hid in plain sight
item.description: Itâ€™s about time to say the quiet part out loud: Elizabeth spent seventy years washing her bloodstained hands, and even now after she has passed, they remain unclean.

item.title: Ketanji Brown Jackson is the latest victim of Biden's fruitless optics
item.description: With Jackson, Biden extends his holy mission of diversity beyond the Cabinet; meanwhile, her nomination process has forcibly reopened wounds for Black women across the country.
